item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 10:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Clippy – 90s UI for local LLMs (927 points | 231 comments)
2. WebMonkeys: parallel GPU programming in JavaScript (40 points | 6 comments)
3. Claude's system prompt is over 24k tokens with tools (308 points | 114 comments)
4. Launch HN: Exa (YC S21) – The web as a database (336 points | 118 comments)
5. OpenAI reaches agreement to buy Windsurf for $3B (496 points | 458 comments)
6. Cuttlefish 'talk' with their arms, study reveals (25 points | 6 comments)
7. Alignment is not free: How model upgrades can silence your confidence signals (69 points | 17 comments)
8. Matt Godbolt sold me on Rust by showing me C++ (430 points | 377 comments)
9. VVVVVV Source Code (260 points | 38 comments)
10. I built an AI code review agent in a few hours, here's what I learned (7 points | 1 comment)
11. docker2exe: Convert a Docker image to an executable (64 points | 33 comments)
12. Tabular (YC S24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
13. (ab?)using Node module hooks to speed up development (26 points | 5 comments)
14. Bloat is still software's biggest vulnerability (2024) (144 points | 96 comments)
15. Old Timey Code and Old Timey Mono Fonts (123 points | 15 comments)
16. ACE-Step: A step towards music generation foundation model (83 points | 32 comments)
17. Show HN: Whippy Term - GUI terminal for embedded development (Linux and Windows) (68 points | 9 comments)
18. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (606 points | 572 comments)
19. Brush (Bo(u)rn(e) RUsty SHell) a POSIX and Bash-Compatible Shell in Rust (128 points | 69 comments)
20. Scientists have found a way to 'tattoo' tardigrades (35 points | 11 comments)
21. India launches attack on 9 sites in Pakistan and Pakistani Jammu and Kashmir (334 points | 337 comments)
22. DoorDash to acquire Deliveroo (117 points | 149 comments)
23. Accents in latent spaces: How AI hears accent strength in English (210 points | 109 comments)
24. Nnd – a TUI debugger alternative to GDB, LLDB (247 points | 78 comments)
25. FTC rule on unfair or deceptive fees to take effect on May 12 (152 points | 96 comments)
26. Sutton and Barto book implementation (64 points | 9 comments)
27. Is Planet Nine Alone in the Outer System? (98 points | 52 comments)
28. Loving 21st century gaming like an 18th century furniture expert (16 points | 1 comment)
29. Jury orders NSO to pay $167M for hacking WhatsApp users (162 points | 65 comments)
30. Show HN: Plexe – ML Models from a Prompt (106 points | 44 comments)
